name: py-sentry-sdk

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: py-certifi
dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.

dependencies.name: py-flask
dependencies.description: A simple framework for building complex web applications.

dependencies.name: py-blinker
dependencies.description: Fast, simple object-to-object and broadcast signaling

dependencies.name: py-quart
dependencies.description: A Python ASGI web microframework with the same API as Flask.

dependencies.name: py-bottle
dependencies.description:
Bottle is a fast, simple and lightweight WSGI micro web-framework for
Python.

dependencies.name: py-falcon
dependencies.description:
Falcon is a reliable, high-performance Python web framework for building
large-scale app backends and microservices.

dependencies.name: py-django
dependencies.description: The Web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.

dependencies.name: py-sanic
dependencies.description:
Sanic is a Flask-like Python 3.5+ web server that is written to go fast.
It is based on the work done by the amazing folks at magicstack

dependencies.name: py-celery
dependencies.description: Celery - Distributed Task Queue.

dependencies.name: py-apache-beam
dependencies.description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.

dependencies.name: py-rq
dependencies.description:
RQ (Redis Queue) is a simple Python library for queueing jobs and
processing them in the background with workers.

dependencies.name: py-aiohttp
dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.

dependencies.name: py-tornado
dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-sqlalchemy
dependencies.description: The Python SQL Toolkit and Object Relational Mapper

dependencies.name: py-pyspark
dependencies.description: Python bindings for Apache Spark

dependencies.name: py-pure-eval
dependencies.description: Safely evaluate AST nodes without side effects.

dependencies.name: py-executing
dependencies.description: Get the currently executing AST node of a frame, and other information.

dependencies.name: py-asttokens
dependencies.description: Annotate AST trees with source code positions.

dependencies.name: py-chalice
dependencies.description: Python Serverless Microframework for AWS.

dependencies.name: py-httpx
dependencies.description:
HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync
and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.

dependent_to.name: py-custodian
dependent_to.description:
Custodian is a simple, robust and flexible just-in-time (JIT) job
management framework written in Python. Using custodian, you can create
wrappers that perform error checking, job management and error recovery.
It has a simple plugin framework that allows you to develop specific job
management workflows for different applications.

dependent_to.name: py-wandb
dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.
